column1: The employees of the Petitioner Company
The  Petitioner  has  made  arrangements  for  Fintek  to  take  over  the  workforce  the
Petitioner  Company  had  employed.  It  is  the  contention  of  the  Petitioner  that  the
workforce includes the 5th to 22nd Respondents. The 5th to 22nd Respondents among the
others, amounting to 52 employees, had been offered continuation of employment and
